'''''Amanita augusta''''' is a species of [[agaric]] [[fungus]] in the family [[Amanitaceae]]. Found in the [[Pacific Northwest]] region of North America, it was formerly referred to as ''Amanita franchetti'' sensu Thiers, but suspected of being a distinct species. It was formally described as a new species in 2013.<ref name="Bojantchev 2012"/>
